page.title: 08NAPTON SHOW AND MILK RACE
page.content: On Saturday May 25th I went to Napton Show and I rode a black pony called Bimbo. He is very hairy. There was a lot of music and I won a rosette for musical cans. We each had a can and we had to put it on one of the poles in the middle. I was on a pony called Pop in the fancy dress, we were corn dollies, and I won a rosette. We had a lolly pop and an ice cream and candy floss. The Milk Race is an international cycle race sponsored by the Milk Marketing Board. It lasts for two weeks and goes in stages all over Britain. On Wednesday, Mum shot in the door and she said there is a crowd of people. It was the Milk Race. There were some hats too and there were about 60 bikes.
